Question: In 2009, this person wrote to Tenzin Gyatso, the 14th Dalai Lama, asking him why he was not a vegetarian.
Hints: In 1965, the Beatles released the ____ composition "Yesterday", featuring a string quartet.
The following year, he and Jackson worked on "Say Say Say", this person's most recent US number one as of 2012[update].
Later that year, ex-Moody Blues guitarist Denny Laine joined the ____s and Seiwell to form the band Wings.
